overview: Tech Mentro is the leading Java, J2ee, .Net, PHP, C, C++, Struts, Spring and Hibernate Training Institute of Noida, NCR, India. It is managed by a team of highly talented professionals who have more than 30 years of combined I.T. and Corporate Training experience. The sole aim of Tech Mentro is to fill the ever increasing gap between the skills required in Industry and possessed by the prospective employees (engineering and MCA students).

web_presences.title: Tech Mentro-IT Training Institute or Center
